sabine-wren-officer.author: Fantasy Flight Games
sabine-wren-officer.release: Rebellion in the Rim Campaign Armada

sabine-wren-officer.name: Sabine Wren
sabine-wren-officer.ability: At the start of the Ship Phase, you may discard this card to place 1 proximity mine token in the play area at distance 1-2 of an obstacle and beyond distance 3 of enemy ships.
